mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS IN(0,1) AND LINE_ORDER = CURR_ORDER AND USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , CURR_ORDER , LINE_ORDER , APPR_STATUS , LINE_NO , USER_NO , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS IN(0,1) AND LINE_ORDER = CURR_ORDER AND USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY APPR_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(A.APPR_NO) FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS IN(0,1) AND L.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CURR_ORDER < LINE_ORDER

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , CURR_ORDER , LINE_NO , L.USER_NO , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS IN(0,1) AND L.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CURR_ORDER < LINE_ORDER
SELECT COUNT(A.APPR_NO) FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPR_STATUS IN(2,3)
SELECT REF_NO , R.APPR_NO , USER_NO , REF_TYPE , READ_YN , READ_DATE FROM T_APPR_REF R JOIN T_APPROVAL A ON R.APPR_NO = A.APPR_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPR_STATUS IN(0,1)

SELECT A.APPR_NO AS APPR_NO , APPR_USER , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , A.DEPT_NO as DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , LINE_NO , L.USER_NO as USER_NO , CURR_ORDER , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO JOIN T_USER U ON U.USER_NO = APPR_USER WHERE L.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND LINE_ORDER = CURR_ORDER AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , APPR_USER , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , DEPT_NO , D.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME , R.RANK_NAME as RANK_NAME , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , CURR_ORDER , LINE_NO , L.USER_NO , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO JOIN T_USER U ON U.USER_NO = APPR_USER JOIN T_RANK R ON R.RANK_NO = U.RANK_NO JOIN T_DEPT D ON D.DEPT_NO = U.DEPT_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS IN(0,1) AND L.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CURR_ORDER < LINE_ORDER AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}

SELECT APPR_NO , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , APPR_USER , D.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME , APPR_TYPE , A.DEPT_NO as DEPT_NO , APPR_DATE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_TITLE , APPR_STATUS , A.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_USER U ON U.USER_NO = APPR_USER JOIN T_DEPT D ON D.DEPT_NO = U.DEPT_NO WHERE APPR_USER = #{userNo} AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , APPR_USER , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , A.DEPT_NO as DEPT_NO , D.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME , A.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , CURR_ORDER , LINE_NO , L.USER_NO , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO JOIN T_USER U ON U.USER_NO = APPR_USER JOIN T_DEPT D ON D.DEPT_NO = U.DEPT_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS IN(2,3) AND L.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}

WITH MY_DOC_LIST AS( SELECT A.APPR_NO , A.APPR_USER , A.APPR_TYPE , A.APPR_DATE , A.APPR_TITLE , A.CURR_ORDER , A.APPR_STATUS FROM T_APPROVAL A WHERE A.APPR_STATUS = 1 AND A.APPR_USER = #{userNo} ORDER BY A.APPR_DATE DESC ) SELECT APPR_NO , APPR_USER , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , CURR_ORDER , APPR_STATUS FROM MY_DOC_LIST A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

WITH MY_DOC_LIST AS( SELECT A.APPR_NO , A.APPR_USER , A.APPR_TYPE , A.APPR_DATE , A.APPR_TITLE , A.CURR_ORDER , A.APPR_STATUS FROM T_APPROVAL A WHERE A.APPR_STATUS IN(2,3) AND A.APPR_USER = #{userNo} ORDER BY A.APPR_DATE DESC ) SELECT APPR_NO , APPR_USER , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , CURR_ORDER , APPR_STATUS FROM MY_DOC_LIST A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_APPROVAL ( APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , CURR_ORDER , APPR_STATUS , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_USER ) VALUES ( LPAD(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, 4, '0') , #{apprUser} , #{deptNo} , #{apprType} , SYSDATE , #{apprTitle} , #{apprContent} , 1 , 0 , SYSDATE , #{apprUser} )
mapper.select: SELECT LINE_NO , L.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , L.USER_NO as USER_NO , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME , R.RANK_NAME as RANK_NAME , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON , L.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE , L.CREATE_USER as CREATE_USER FROM T_APPR_LINE L LEFT JOIN T_APPROVAL A ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON L.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN T_DEPT D ON U.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN T_RANK R ON U.RANK_NO = R.RANK_NO WHERE L.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}
SELECT APPR_NO , ENFORCE_DATE , COOP_DEPT FROM T_DRAFT WHERE APPR_NO = #{apprNo}

SELECT PD.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , PURCH_DEPT , PURCH_EMP_NAME , PURCH_PURPOSE , PURCH_DEADLINE , PURCH_TOTAL
, PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_UNIT , PRODUCT_AMT , PRODUCT_PRICE FROM T_PURCH_DRAFT PD RIGHT JOIN T_PURCH_HISTORY PH ON PD.APPR_NO = PH.APPR_NO WHERE PD.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_APPROVAL SET APPR_STATUS = 1 WHERE APPR_NO = #{apprNo} AND APPR_STATUS = 0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A.APPR_NO) FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo} AND L.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND L.LINE_ORDER = A.CURR_ORDER

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , A.APPR_TYPE as APPR_TYPE , A.APPR_TITLE as APPR_TITLE , A.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE , A.CREATE_USER as CREATE_USER , A.MODIFY_DATE as MODIFY_DATE , A.UPDATE_USER as UPDATE_USER , U.USER_NAME as USER_NAME FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON A.CREATE_USER = U.USER_NO WHERE A.APPR_STATUS = 4 ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , A.APPR_TYPE as APPR_TYPE , A.APPR_CONTENT as APPR_CONTENT , A.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE , A.CREATE_USER as CREATE_USER , A.MODIFY_DATE as MODIFY_DATE , A.UPDATE_USER as UPDATE_USER FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_USER U1 ON A.CREATE_USER = U1.USER_NO WHERE A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo} AND A.APPR_STATUS = 4
SELECT DISTINCT APPR_TYPE as APPR_TYPE FROM T_APPROVAL WHERE APPR_STATUS = '4' ORDER BY APPR_TYPE
SELECT APPR_TYPE , APPR_CONTENT FROM T_APPROVAL WHERE APPR_STATUS = '4' AND APPR_TYPE = #{apprType} AND ROWNUM = 1
